banner.title: Tulum Natural Experience
banner.paragraph: Be one of the few lucky ones who experienced this unique place, only a handful know about it, as access is restricted.

header.title: Tulum Tour 2025
header.description: Private tour to Tulum with cenote and optional visit to a traditional village: history, landscapes, and crystal-clear waters in the Mexican Caribbean.

itinerary.pickup: Pickup from your Hotel/Airbnb in your chosen area in a private vehicle with air conditioning.
itinerary.zone: Direct and private transfer to the archaeological site of Tulum (a shopping stop can be added).
itinerary.cenote: Visit to a cenote (we will make suggestions).

description.paragraph1: Discover the magic of the Mexican Caribbean with this private tour to Tulum, an ancient Mayan city built by the sea. Enjoy a day full of history, stunning landscapes, and crystal-clear waters, with the option to visit a cenote or spend the day at the beach.
description.paragraph2: Includes visit to the archaeological site of Tulum and a cenote visit for a unique experience.

cenotes.intro: We can take you to one of the following cenotes, you choose which:

items.title: Comfortable sneakers or sandals
items.details: for walking around the archaeological zone

items.title: Swimsuit
items.details: for swimming in the cenote or beach

items.title: Towel and change of clothes
items.details: especially if you plan to swim

items.title: Cash
items.details: for entrance fees, tips, souvenirs, etc.
